channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ho-ho-ho is where the heart is: How Santa meets kids in 2025
item.description: Santa Claus is coming to town — and he's down with the digital age. The big picture: The old Santa model consisted of a long line of tiny tots waiting...

item.title: U.S. murders on pace for largest one-year drop on record
item.description: Data: Real Time Crime Index ; Chart: Axios Visuals The U.S. is on pace for the largest one-year drop in murders the nation has ever recorded, accordin...

item.title: Grocery stores open Christmas Eve 2025: Costco, Aldi, Publix, Albertsons, Kroger hours
item.description: Last-minute holiday shoppers will find fewer options Wednesday, as most grocery stores shorten hours on Christmas Eve and some close earlier than usua...

item.title: Even some Santas are feeling the labor market pinch
item.description: Just a few years ago, Santa Claus literally couldn't come to town: Headlines warned of too few St. Nick lookalikes available to make appearances at ma...

item.title: Trump admin bars 5 Europeans its says pressed tech platforms to "censor" U.S. views
item.description: The Trump administration imposed visa restrictions Tuesday on five Europeans the State Department accused of leading "efforts to coerce American platf...

item.title: Despite anti-media rhetoric, the government is still reading the news
item.description: The Trump administration is spending tens of thousands of dollars on paywalled news sites, including Politico and Bloomberg, despite earlier criticism...

item.title: Justice Department struggles to handle massive Epstein file release
item.description: The massive size of the Epstein files — perhaps more than a million pages — has created problems for the Justice Department.

item.title: What we know (and what we don’t) about the Epstein files’ release
item.description: The tranche revealed wide-ranging references to President Donald Trump and detailed efforts to interview Prince Andrew in two investigations.

item.title: I am The Post’s ‘federal government whisperer.’ It’s been brutal.
item.description: One reporter’s effort to show how Trump was transforming government brought her 1,168 new sources — and nearly broke her.

item.title: Europe condemns U.S. move to bar individuals over tech monitoring
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said that the State Department would bar several Europeans for their actions in monitoring the internet, which he chara...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
